Title: On Szegő Formulas for Truncated Wiener–Hopf Operators
Abstract: © 2019, The Author(s).We consider functions of multi-dimensional versions of truncated Wiener–Hopf operators with smooth symbols, and study the scaling asymptotics of their traces. The obtained results extend the asymptotic formulas obtained by H. Widom in the 1980’s to non-smooth functions, and non-smooth truncation domains. The obtained asymptotic formulas are used to analyse the scaling limit of the spatially bipartite entanglement entropy of thermal equilibrium states of non-interacting fermions at positive temperature.
